mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y.%m.%d') AS date ,ROUND(AVG(ENVIR.ILLUMINANCE),1) AS illuminanceAvg, (ANALYSIS.GROWTH) AS growthAvg FROM CROP_ANALYSIS_INFO ANALYSIS ,CROP_ENVIR_INFO ENVIR WHERE ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_NO = ENVIR.ENVIR_NO GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y/%M/%D') ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y.%m.%d') AS date ,ROUND(AVG(ENVIR.ILLUMINANCE),1) AS illuminanceAvg, (ANALYSIS.GROWTH) AS growthAvg FROM CROP_ANALYSIS_INFO ANALYSIS ,CROP_ENVIR_INFO ENVIR WHERE ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_NO = ENVIR.ENVIR_NO GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y/%M/%D')
HAVING date like '%${value}%'
ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y.%m.%d') AS date ,ROUND(AVG(ENVIR.ILLUMINANCE),1) AS luxAvg, (ANALYSIS.GROWTH) AS growthAvg FROM CROP_ANALYSIS_INFO ANALYSIS ,CROP_ENVIR_INFO ENVIR WHERE ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_NO = ENVIR.ENVIR_NO GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y/%M/%D') ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #{no},10

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y.%m.%d') AS date, DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%H:%i') AS time, ENVIR.ILLUMINANCE AS illuminance, ENVIR.HORIZONTAL_ANGLE AS horizontalAngle, ENVIR.VERTICAL_ANGLE AS verticalAngle, ANALYSIS.GROWTH AS growth, ANALYSIS.CROP_SIDE_IMAGE AS cropSideImageURL , ANALYSIS.CROP_VERTICAL_IMAGE AS cropVerticalImageURL FROM CROP_ANALYSIS_INFO ANALYSIS ,CROP_ENVIR_INFO ENVIR WHERE ANALYSIS.ANALYSIS_NO = ENVIR.ENVIR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(ENVIR.DATE_TIME,'%Y.%m.%d') like #{value} ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT AVG(CROP_SIDE_R) AS cropSideR, AVG(CROP_SIDE_G) AS cropSideG, AVG(CROP_SIDE_B) AS cropSideB, AVG(CROP_VERTICAL_R) AS cropVerticalR, AVG(CROP_VERTICAL_G) AS cropVerticalG, AVG(CROP_VERTICAL_B) AS cropVerticalB FROM CROP_ANALYSIS_DATA
